science_magazines.name: New Scientist
science_magazines.description: Covers developments in science, technology, health, and the environment with expert journalism.
science_magazines.credibility: Highly regarded for in-depth scientific articles and accurate reporting.

science_magazines.name: Scientific American
science_magazines.description: Provides comprehensive coverage of scientific advancements and their implications for society.
science_magazines.credibility: One of the oldest and most respected science magazines in the world.

science_magazines.name: National Geographic
science_magazines.description: Known for its stunning photography and detailed articles on science, history, and culture.
science_magazines.credibility: Widely respected for its factual reporting and visual storytelling.

science_magazines.name: Popular Science
science_magazines.description: Makes complex scientific topics accessible to the general public, covering a broad range of subjects.
science_magazines.credibility: Known for its engaging and educational content.

science_magazines.name: Discover
science_magazines.description: Focuses on scientific discoveries and innovations across various disciplines.
science_magazines.credibility: Renowned for making science accessible and exciting to the general public.

science_magazines.name: Smithsonian Magazine
science_magazines.description: Covers a wide range of topics including science, history, art, and culture.
science_magazines.credibility: Highly credible and part of the Smithsonian Institution.

scientific_journals.name: Science
scientific_journals.description: The peer-reviewed journal of the American Association for the Advancement of Science (AAAS), covering all scientific disciplines.
scientific_journals.credibility: High credibility with rigorous peer review and minimal editorial bias.

scientific_journals.name: Nature
scientific_journals.description: Publishes news and articles on a wide range of scientific topics, including groundbreaking research and analysis.
scientific_journals.credibility: One of the world's leading multidisciplinary science journals.

scientific_journals.name: The Lancet
scientific_journals.description: A leading medical journal publishing original research, reviews, and editorials.
scientific_journals.credibility: Renowned for its high-impact medical research and comprehensive peer review process.

scientific_journals.name: Cell
scientific_journals.description: Focuses on publishing research articles in the field of life sciences, including molecular and cell biology.
scientific_journals.credibility: Widely respected for its groundbreaking research in biology and medicine.

scientific_journals.name: Nature Communications
scientific_journals.description: An open-access journal covering all areas of the natural sciences.
scientific_journals.credibility: Known for high-quality research articles and open access policy.

scientific_journals.name: Science Advances
scientific_journals.description: An open-access journal publishing innovative research across all scientific disciplines.
scientific_journals.credibility: High standards of peer review and editorial oversight, part of the AAAS journal family.

scientific_journals.name: PLOS ONE
scientific_journals.description: An inclusive journal community working to advance science for the benefit of society, through the rapid dissemination of research across all areas of science and medicine.
scientific_journals.credibility: Known for its inclusive approach and open access policy.

scientific_journals.name: Proceedings of the National Academy of Sciences (PNAS)
scientific_journals.description: One of the world's most-cited and comprehensive multidisciplinary scientific journals, publishing high-quality research in all scientific disciplines.
scientific_journals.credibility: Highly respected for its rigorous peer review and significant contributions to scientific knowledge.

quantum_computing.name: Berkeley Center for Quantum Information and Computation
Division of Quantum Physics and Quantum Information
quantum_computing.university: University of Science and Technology of China

neuroscience.name: MIT Department of Brain and Cognitive Sciences
University of California, San Diego Neurosciences Graduate Program

robotics.name: MIT Robotics and Artificial Intelligence Lab

biological_sciences.name: Harvard Medical School Department of Biological Chemistry and Molecular Pharmacology
Peking University School of Life Sciences
University of Cambridge Department of Biochemistry
Yale University Department of Molecular, Cellular and Developmental Biology

general_research_institutes.name: National University of Singapore Research Institutes

history_museums.name: Smithsonian National Museum of American History

art_museums.name: Zeitz Museum of Contemporary Art Africa

science_museums.name: Smithsonian National Air and Space Museum

natural_history_museums.name: Museum of New Zealand Te Papa Tongarewa

encyclopedias.name: Encyclopaedia Britannica
encyclopedias.description: One of the most trusted sources of general knowledge, available in both digital and print formats.
encyclopedias.notes: Known for its authoritative content, rigorously fact-checked and continually updated.

encyclopedias.name: World Book Encyclopedia
encyclopedias.description: Provides comprehensive information on a wide range of topics for learners of all ages.
encyclopedias.notes: The only general reference encyclopedia still published in print, widely used in educational settings.

encyclopedias.name: Encyclopaedia Larousse
encyclopedias.description: A major French-language encyclopedia available online, covering a wide range of general knowledge topics.
encyclopedias.notes: Highly regarded in the Francophone world for its detailed and reliable content.

encyclopedias.name: Treccani Encyclopedia
encyclopedias.description: An Italian encyclopedia known for its comprehensive and scholarly articles.
encyclopedias.notes: A respected source of general knowledge in Italy, available online and in print.

encyclopedias.name: Nationalencyklopedin (NE)
encyclopedias.description: The leading Swedish-language encyclopedia, providing detailed articles on a wide array of subjects.
encyclopedias.notes: Widely used in Sweden for its authoritative and up-to-date information.

encyclopedias.name: Great Russian Encyclopedia
encyclopedias.description: A comprehensive Russian-language encyclopedia covering a broad spectrum of knowledge.
encyclopedias.notes: Known for its extensive and detailed entries, respected in Russian-speaking regions.

encyclopedias.name: Stanford Encyclopedia of Philosophy
encyclopedias.description: A dynamic reference work maintained by experts in philosophy, providing peer-reviewed articles on philosophical topics.
encyclopedias.notes: Highly regarded for its academic rigor and reliability in the field of philosophy.

encyclopedias.name: Merriam-Webster's Encyclopedia of Literature
encyclopedias.description: Provides detailed articles on a wide range of literary topics and authors.
encyclopedias.notes: Known for its comprehensive coverage and authoritative content in literature.

encyclopedias.name: Oxford Research Encyclopedia
encyclopedias.description: A collection of peer-reviewed, in-depth articles across multiple disciplines.
encyclopedias.notes: Offers high-quality, authoritative content authored by experts in their fields.

encyclopedias.name: Columbia Encyclopedia
encyclopedias.description: Offers comprehensive coverage of a wide range of topics, from general knowledge to specialized fields.
encyclopedias.notes: Known for its thorough and accurate information.

encyclopedias.name: The Canadian Encyclopedia
encyclopedias.description: Provides detailed information on Canadian history, culture, and notable figures.
encyclopedias.notes: Authoritative source of information on Canadian topics.

encyclopedias.name: Enciclopedia Italiana (Treccani)
encyclopedias.description: An authoritative Italian-language encyclopedia covering a wide range of subjects.
encyclopedias.notes: Renowned for its scholarly articles and comprehensive coverage.

encyclopedias.name: Deutsche Biographie
encyclopedias.description: A biographical dictionary that provides detailed information about notable German figures.
encyclopedias.notes: Highly respected for its detailed biographical entries.

encyclopedias.name: Britannica School
encyclopedias.description: An educational resource for students providing reliable information on a wide range of topics.
encyclopedias.notes: Widely used in educational settings for its authoritative and accessible content.
